text: geudeul-ege hananim-ui malsseum-i nangsongdoel ttae geubungwaui mannam-eul wonchi anihan jadeul-i malhagil igeos oee daleun geos-eul nangsonghasiyo animyeon i geos-eul bakkula malhani illeogalodoe nae seuseulo naega geugeos-eul bakkul su eobs-eumyeo naneun naege gyesidoen geosman-eul ttaleul ppun-ila man-il naega junimkke geo yeoghandamyeon museoun beol-i iss-eum-eul du lyeowo hanila
